Title: The Bone Man
Writer: Wolf Haas (novel), Wolf Haas (screenplay), Josef Hader (screenplay), Wolfgang Murnberger (screenplay)
Actors: Josef Hader, Josef Bierbichler, Birgit Minichmayr, Christoph Luser
Plot: Private Investigator Brenner is handling a case at the grill-station "Löschenkohl". There he finds - besides some chicken - also other meat...that doesn't belong in a good meal.
